name: Octopus vulgaris or Tako ring
description:
The octopus is a cephalopod of the order Octopoda.

Octopodes are characterized by their eight arms (not tentacles), usually bearing suction cups.
Octopodes can walk on two arms on a solid surface, while at the same time imitating a coconut or a clump of seaweed.
Octopodes can change colour and shape.
Octopodes are highly intelligent, probably more intelligent than any other order of invertebrates.

Octopodes have three hearts.

And here comes TAKO to be carried about on one of your fingers :)

Available in shell pink, and sizes 5 through 10.

Flame-worked in the nano-lab, then annealed for extra strength and durability.

Please specify TAKO size in Paypal's, 'note to Seller' when placing your order, or
email me at:
nanotopia at me dot com.
Please allow up to 1 week for shipping. **Sent out Small Packet Air which does not come with tracking information and takes 4-10 business days. 
If you would like your item to arrive faster, with tracking you can upgrade to Xpress if you are in the US for an extra $10.00. This option takes 3-4 business days.

Thank you for looking!

name: Sculpted Heart
description:
Limited edition 'designer' matte (etched glass) finish, stylized white glass anatomical heart.

Each 'stylized' anatomical heart is made upon order, no two 
are ever exactly the same thus making each heart one of a kind, just like you!

Flame-worked by hand at nanopod: Hybrid Studio, then annealed
for extra strength and durability. 

Approx. 4cm in diameter.
Glass heart ship with a 18" sterling silver snake chain.

Thank you for looking!

name: Nidarian Gatherers
description:
"Hunters and Collectors"

Nidarian ships on a rescue mission collecting artifacts from a Terrestrial surface to learn about human history.

An evolving story...

Each Nidarian is built using handmade (recycled) sterling silver and copper components in the nanopod laboratory. 
No two are ever the same.

Each 'artifact' is grown gradually within a flame using hand-pulled glass. 
Some artifacts yield smaller Cnidarian life forms, diatoms, protozoans, small crustaceans, and the eggs and larval stages of larger animals. 

Worn as a pendant, ideally they would rest around the solar plexus. They do not currently ship with a chain. Plankton chains will be listed separately within the next two weeks, and will compliment the Nidarians.

Sterling silver, fine silver, copper, enamel, hand-pulled glass, cubic zirconia (within the glass)
Currently a limited edition- only 7 will be created and signed.
approximately 11cm long, 5cm wide
weighty.
Please allow two weeks for creation.
When ordering, please mention your favorite colours.
Shipped Xpress to the states.

Worldwide shipping will vary, these will need to ship with tracking and
this tends to be expensive. Please look into your shipping options using the following information via Canada Post, or UPS: weight- .25, packing-5 inches x5x5 (approx) 
my postal code-M6G 1H1 (Toronto, ON)

♥♥Layaway is available♥♥
Price can be divided into 2 separate payments. Please contact me to arrange
your custom piece and layaway plan.

Thank you for looking!
